results.description: A list of "frightful flicks waiting to be rediscovered" -- compiled by the self-described leading name in the world of horror: Fangoria magazine.
results.name: Fangoria's 101 Best Horror Movies You've Never Seen

results.description: Part of the AFI 100 Years… series, AFI's 100 Years…100 Thrills is a list of the top 100 heart-pounding movies in American cinema. The list was unveiled by the American Film Institute on June 12, 2001, during a CBS special hosted by Harrison Ford.
results.name: AFI's 100 Most Thrilling American Films

results.description: A list of films that earned its actresses the Razzie Award for Worst Actress of the year.
results.name: Films featuring a Razzie winning Worst Actress Performance

results.description: A list of all films in the Star Wars universe including the theatrical motion picture releases.
results.name: Star Wars Expanded Universe

results.description: Here's my list of best picture winners for the Oscars. Thought it would be neat to see them all together. There's a lot of movies here I have never even heard of.
results.name: Best Picture Winners - The Academy Awards

results.description: A list of the films that were nominated at the 2008 Oscars for best picture.
results.name: 80th Academy Awards (2008) - Best Picture Nominations

results.description: The View Askewniverse is a fictional universe created by writer/director Kevin Smith, featured in several films, comics and a television series; it is named for Smith's production company, View Askew Productions.
results.name: The View Askewniverse

results.description: Name pretty much says it all, here's the top 50 grossing films of all time.
results.name: Top 50 Grossing Films of All Time (Worldwide)

results.description: A list of the films that were nominated at the 2010 Oscars for best picture.

results.description: A list of the theatrical releases for Marvel's Avengers characters that are in the latest Avengers movie.

results.description: A list of the films that were nominated at the 2011 Oscars for best picture.
